(as of Nov 30,2022 11:51:04 UTC – Details)


Meet Bluey! A loveable, six-year-old Blue Heeler dog, whose everyday family life becomes a playful adventure. Bluey and her friends have made up a fun game! Play a game of “Shadowlands”. Stay in the shadowy bits, collect 5 cupcake cards and be the first to the picnic! There is a palm tree in the center of the board that players turn to change the shadowy bits as they play! This fun and unpredictable board game is great for children ages 3 and up!
Country of origin : China
Turn the palm tree: Turn the palm tree in the center of the board and see the shadowy bits change!
Fun to play: Based on the fun adventures of Bluey and her friends, this board game is full of fun and laughter
Totally unpredictable: A game that keeps changing and is totally unpredictable! For ages 3 and up!

Read more

Bluey and her friends are ready to play a game of “Shadowlands” with you!

This is such a fun game to play! The way Bluey describes it is – “It’s a game where all the shadowy grassy bits are the land, and all the bits in the sun is the sea!” The idea is to be the first one to the picnic by staying in the shadowy bits and collecting cupcakes! Based on one of Bluey’s episodes including Bingo, Coco and Snickers? Turn the palm tree in the center of the board to change the shadowy bits as you play! This fun and unpredictable board game is great for children ages 3 and up!

Read more

There is unpredictable fun in this continually changing game!

In the center of the board is a very special palm tree. By turning the palm tree you can change the shadowy bits and the direction of the clouds! If you are lucky it might even give you a cupcake!

Read more

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments

item.title: Kids Against Maturity: Card Game for Kids and Families, Super Fun Hilarious for Family Party Game Night
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)



BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and funny innuendos for the adults, it can be enjoyed by all ages. Best results when played with 4 players or more.
PLAY IT ANY TIME ANY PLACE – One game set includes 600 question and answer cards and a handy box to store it all. It’s portable and a take anywhere size game. Become an instant champion while camping, sleepovers, game nights, family gatherings, summer camp, plane trips and more!
IT’S SIMPLE & ABSOLUTELY HILARIOUS – Kids Against Maturity combines the tried and tested fill-in-the- blank game-play, a perfect enjoyable hilarious way to bring your family together.
GET THE GAME ROLLING IN SECONDS – Each player gets 10 white answer cards and takes turns asking the blue question cards. Each question asker chooses the funniest answer, and the player with the highest amount of most amusing responses, wins the game.
OBLIGATORY WARNING – Humorless hover-parents and those who don’t appreciate flatulence jokes, may not approve. PLEASE REMOVE ANY CARD THAT YOU DON’T APPROVE OF. One thing is for sure; just like other tabletop board games, it’ll get your kids away from their phones, tablets, Fortnite, and other electronic devices for at least 30-90 min. Unplug together!

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)

Price: $54.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:06 UTC – Details)


A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it. In Mysterium, one player takes on the role of the ghost and over the course of a week, tries to lead the investigators to their culprit. Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you? Can the psychics determine the weapon, location and killer or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder? Contents: 6 Intuition tokens, 6 sleeves, 6 clairvoyance level markers, 36 clairvoyance tokens, clock board, 4 progress boards, 18 character psychic cards, 18 location psychic cards, 18 object psychic cards, sand timer, 18 character ghost cards, 18 location ghost cards, 18 object ghost, 6 ghost tokens, 84 vision cards, 6 culprit tokens, 3 crow markers, clairvoyance track; rulebook. In the 1920’s, Mr. MacDowell, a gifted astrologist, entered in his new house when he immediately detected a supernatural being. Gathering eminent mediums of his time for an extraordinary séance, they will have 7 hours to contact the ghost and investigate to unlock an old mystery. Unable to talk, the amnesic ghost will communicate with the mediums through visions (illustrated cards). They will have to decipher the images to help the ghost remember how he was murdered (who? where? which weapon?). The more they cooperate and guess, well, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit. This party game is one of the most anticipated games, thanks to innovative, thrilling and immersive features. It offers cooperation and investigation with an asymmetrical gameplay. While playing the ghost or a medium, you will have fun trying to guess what other players have in their minds! So enter in this strange manor and let yourself be led by your intuition.
MYSTERY BOARD GAME: A horrible crime was committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor thirty years ago. Now the mansion is haunted by the ghost of the murdered servant and it’s up to a group of psychic investigators to get to the bottom of the mystery.
COOPERATIVE BOARD GAME: One player takes on the role of the victim (who is now a ghost) and the rest play as psychics. Over the course of the game, players work together to solve a mystery by psychically communicating with the victim. The ghost tries to lead psychics to the correct culprit.
INTERPRET VISIONS TO SOLVE MYSTERIES: Each player investigates a case assigned to them to determine who the actual murderer is. Psychics receive numerous visions from the ghost with clues. Can they determine the weapon, location and killer, or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?
HIGH VARIABILITY: Dozens of different suspects, weapons and locations ensure no two games are the same! LOOKING FOR A NEW CHALLENGE? Expansion sets are available (Expansions require base game to play).

Read more

A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it.

In Mysterium, one player tries to lead the investigators to their culprit.

Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you?

Can the psychics determine the weapon, location, and identity of the murderer?

Or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?

Read more

They will have to decipher the images to help the ghost remember how he was murdered.

  • Who?
  • Where?
  • What weapon?

The more players cooperate, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit!

Each player must investigate a case assigned to them, determining if the clues lead to the actual murderer.

While playing the ghost or a medium, you’ll have fun trying to guess what other players have on their minds.

Family Faceoff is soon to be a Family Game Night Favorite! Imagine if charades, a scavenger hunt, and karaoke night had a baby. That’s Family Faceoff. This game is meant to get you moving. It will exercise your body, your mind, and your funny bone. It’s the kind of game where parents and kids are equal, and you could finish in 20 minutes, or spend an entire rainy day playing.
Your next family favorite on game night! Teams FACE OFF in four lively categories that will tickle your funny bone and get your mind and body moving.
Created in the minds of the virally funny Holderness Family and brought to you by the creators of Watch Ya’ Mouth. Over a billion views + millions of games sold = winning combination.
Family Friendly! A simple, easy game where kids and adults are on equal ground that can be played nearly anywhere. Need to spice up a family game night, holiday party, road trip, beach trip, airport wait, etc. ? Leave it to Family Faceoff to bring the heat.
Fast, frenzied, competitive fun! Can be played in 20 minutes if you’re feeling feisty.
400 family-friendly cards great for kids and adults aged 8 years old to 100. Download the App for an extra layer of fun!

4.5
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:50:50 UTC – Details)

It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

4.5
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) THE OFFICE CROSSWORDS is our second puzzle book dedicated to the hit TV show THE OFFICE.  Relive 65 episodes of this iconic show with these Crossword Puzzles that are dedicated to specific episodes.  This is a sequel to “The Unofficial THE OFFICE Word Search, Jumbles, and Trivia book.”  We want ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:35:37 UTC – Details)

THE OFFICE CROSSWORDS is our second puzzle book dedicated to the hit TV show THE OFFICE.  Relive 65 episodes of this iconic show with these Crossword Puzzles that are dedicated to specific episodes.  This is a sequel to “The Unofficial THE OFFICE Word Search, Jumbles, and Trivia book.”  We want to thank all the fans who have enjoyed this word search book and have written such great reviews. Our inspiration has come from them.

This book of crossword puzzles has been a labor of love. There are 50 puzzles which cover 65 episodes (15 are double episodes). Each puzzle is based on a specific THE OFFICE episode and all the clues are for that episode. We even list the season and episode number in the Table of Contents.  Some of the themed puzzles are:

Diversity Day S1, E2
Basketball S1, E5
The Dundies S2, E1
Christmas Party S2, E10
Booze Cruise S2, E11
The Injury S2, E12
The Secret S2, E13
Lecture Circuit S5, E16/17
Café Disco S5, E27
Company Picnic S5, E28
Pilot S1, E1
Goodbye, Toby S4, E18/19
The Inner Circle S7, E23
Search Committee S7, E25/26
Pool Party S8, E12
Angry Andy S8, E21
Dwight Christmas S9, E9
Stairmageddon S9, E19
AARM S9, E22/23
Finale S9, E24/25

Here are some  reviews of our Word Search book:

“Perfect for fans of The Office. I loved the different themed word searches, especially the ones based on each main character. Five stars.” – HB

“This is another Miranda Powell themed puzzle book that delivers. There are 40 Word Search and 25 Double Jumble puzzles covering all seasons, characters and more. Very comprehensive. The Trivia questions are challenging.
Highly recommended” – PR

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)
